title: 'Newburgh Sting': Terrorist Cell, Or Group Sold On A Trap By FBI?
teaser: Filmmakers Kate Davis and David Heilbroner discuss their new documentary The Newburgh Sting, which covers the FBI investigation and conviction of four American men for plotting an act of domestic terrorism.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
